doc:
J. Farrell MacDonald https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._Farrell_MacDonald 0 John Farrell MacDonald (June 6, 1875 – August 2, 1952) was an American character actor and director. He played supporting roles and occasional leads. He appeared in over 325 films over a 41-year career from 1911 to 1951, and directed forty-four silent films from 1912 to 1917. MacDonald was the principal director of L. Frank Baum's Oz Film Manufacturing Company, and he can frequently be seen in the films of Frank Capra, Preston Sturges and, especially, John Ford. John_Farrell_MacDonald ( June_6_,_1875 – August_2_,_1952 ) was an_American_character_actor_and_director . He played_supporting roles and occasional_leads . He appeared in over_325_films over a_41-year_career from 1911 to 1951 , and directed forty-four_silent_films from 1912 to 1917 . MacDonald was the_principal_director of L._Frank_Baum 's_Oz_Film_Manufacturing_Company , and he can_frequently_be_seen in the_films of Frank_Capra , Preston_Sturges and , especially , John_Ford .
